M3 iPad Air 11″ and 13″ – $50 Off Retail Starting at $549

The M3 iPad Air is available at a nice discount from Amazon, shaving $50 off the 11″ and 13″ models. The newest model iPad Air includes the M3 chip with Apple Intelligence support, Liquid Retina LCD display, 128GB storage, 12MP front and rear camera, Touch ID on the power button, great battery life, support for Apple Pencil Pro, and is available in a variety of color options.

  • M3 iPad Air 11″ – $549 (down from $599 retail)
  • M3 iPad Air 13″ – $749 (down from $799)

M4 MacBook Pro up to $300 Off

The MacBook Pro series features powerful M4 chips and are available at nice discounts in various configurations with both 14″ and 16″ display sizes, some of the current best deals being:

  • M4 Pro MacBook Pro 16″ 24GB / 512GB for $2249 (down from $2499)
  • M4 Max MacBook Pro 16″ 36GB / 1TB for $3177 (down from $3499)

Apple Watch SE 2 for $170 (Down from $249)

The Apple Watch SE 2nd gen features a 40mm display, GPS, fitness tracking, sleep tracking, crash detection, heart rate monitor, and it’s available at a whopper of a discount, taking 30% off the retail price from $249 bringing it down to $170 in select band sizes and colors.

  • Apple Watch SE 2 for $170 (down from $249 retail)

AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality – $199 (down from $249)

AirPods Pro 2 have hearing aid functionality, active noise cancellation, high fidelity sound, water and sweat resistance, active noise cancellation, Spatial Audio, custom fit, transparency mode, eat detection, a USB-C charging case, and more.
